overview.en: PolkaFoundry (PKF) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. PolkaFoundry has a current supply of 200,000,000 with 9,473,478.35574134 in circulation. The last known price of PolkaFoundry is 1.79525266 USD and is down -4.83 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 3 active market(s) with $3,172,556.78 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://polkafoundry.com.
